column2: ENGLISH
Under your orders your court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] casted a spell to heal you.
I feel alive!
You cast a spell to heal yourself.
Under your lieges orders you casted a spell to heal [From.GetHerHim].
Ok.
You cast a spell to veil your appearance with magic to beautiful in the eyes of others.
Under your orders your court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] casted a spell to predict any danger to you.
Hmm...
You cast a spell to predict any danger to you.
Under your lieges orders you casted a spell to predict any danger to [From.GetHerHim].
Under your orders your court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] casted a spell to protect you from any danger.
Nothing will harm me now.
You cast a spell to protect you from any danger.
Under your lieges orders you casted a spell to protect [From.GetHerHim] from any danger.

The court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.job_mage.Siege.GetName].
Perfect.
You started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].
The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently casted some kind of spell. The sky darkened and after a while meteors started to fall from sky shattering the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName].
Damn.

The court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of [Root.job_mage.GetHerHim]. Then [Root.job_mage.GetSheHe] chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.job_mage.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.
Burn!

You started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of you. Then you chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.

Your lieges ordered you assist the siege of [Root.Siege.GetName]. You started to chant a spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball in front of you. Then you chanted something and the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.job_mage.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.

The enemies had a sorcerer who apparently casted some kind of spell. The air became hot and flames gathered in a huge ball within the enmy camp. Then the ball of flames crashed in the walls of [Root.Siege.GetName] with huge explosion.

The court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] started to chant a spell. The earth suddently stated to quake with shambles of rock flying everywhere. The walls of [Root.job_mage.Siege.GetName] crumbled and many fell to their deaths.
Need to hold on to something.

The court magician [Root.job_mage.GetTitledFirstName] started to chant a spell. The sky became cloudy and wind grew in strength. Soon a storm started in [Root.job_mage.Siege.GetName] - lightning struck the enemies troops and wind pushed them down from walls and against each other.
My job is done.

Damn, it's cold.
